mapper.insert: insert into outpt_medical_care_apply(id,hosp_code, org_code,profile_id, visit_id, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, cert_no, phone, change_type, care_to_medic_id, visit_type, apply_dept_id, apply_company_code, apply_company_name, hope_in_time, apply_id, apply_name, apply_time, is_house, house_bed, nusre_type_code,disease_id, disease_name,referral_main_suit, reality_in_time, status_code, visit_dept_id, visit_doctor_id, visit_doctor_name, visit_time, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{orgCode}, #{profileId}, #{visitId}, #{name}, #{genderCode}, #{age}, #{ageUnitCode}, #{certNo}, #{phone}, #{changeType}, #{careToMedicId}, #{visitType}, #{applyDeptId}, #{applyCompanyCode}, #{applyCompanyName}, #{hopeInTime}, #{applyId}, #{applyName}, #{applyTime}, #{isHouse}, #{houseBed}, #{nusreTypeCode}, #{diseaseId}, #{diseaseName}, #{referralMainSuit},#{realityInTime}, #{statusCode}, #{visitDeptId}, #{visitDoctorId}, #{visitDoctorName}, #{visitTime}, #{remark}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})

insert into outpt_visit ( id, hosp_code, profile_id, out_profile, register_id, register_no, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, birthday, marry_code, nation_code, cert_code, cert_no, phone, now_address, visit_no, visit_code, patient_code, preferential_type_id, source_tj_code, source_tj_remark, insure_code, insure_org_code, insure_no, insure_biz_code, insure_treat_code, insure_patient_id, insure_remark, doctor_id, doctor_name, dept_id, dept_name, visit_time, remark, pym, wbm, is_visit, tran_in_code, is_first_visit, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,occupation_code,contact_name ) values ( #{id}, #{hospCode}, #{profileId}, #{outProfile}, #{registerId}, #{registerNo}, #{name}, #{genderCode}, #{age}, #{ageUnitCode}, #{birthday}, #{marryCode}, #{nationCode}, #{certCode}, #{certNo}, #{phone}, #{nowAddress}, #{visitNo}, #{visitCode}, #{patientCode}, #{preferentialTypeId}, #{sourceTjCode}, #{sourceTjRemark}, #{insureCode}, #{insureOrgCode}, #{insureNo}, #{insureBizCode}, #{insureTreatCode}, #{insurePatientId}, #{insureRemark}, #{doctorId}, #{doctorName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{visitTime}, #{remark}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{isVisit}, #{tranInCode}, #{isFirstVisit}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime},#{occupationCode},#{contactName} ) on duplicate key update pym=#{pym};
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, profile_id, visit_id, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, cert_no, phone, change_type, care_to_medic_id, visit_type, apply_dept_id, (select bd.name from base_dept bd where apply_dept_id = bd.id and hosp_code = bd.hosp_code) as applyDeptName, apply_company_code, apply_company_name, hope_in_time, apply_id, apply_name, apply_time, is_house, house_bed, referral_main_suit, nusre_type_code, disease_id, disease_name, reality_in_time, status_code, visit_dept_id, (SELECT name from base_dept where visit_dept_id = id )visit_dept_name,visit_doctor_id, (SELECT name from sys_user where visit_doctor_id = id ) visit_doctor_name, visit_time, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, if(house_bed is null, '0', '1') is_in, case when a.status_code = '1' then '1' else '0' end isVisit from outpt_medical_care_apply a where id = #{id}

select a.org_code orgID, a.visit_id medical_info_id, b.name clinic_dept from outpt_medical_care_apply a left join base_dept b on a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.visit_dept_id = b.id where a.id = #{id} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.update:
update outpt_medical_care_apply
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
profile_id = #{profileId},
visit_id = #{visitId},
name = #{name},
gender_code = #{genderCode},
age = #{age},
age_unit_code = #{ageUnitCode},
cert_no = #{certNo},
phone = #{phone},
change_type = #{changeType},
visit_type = #{visitType},
referral_main_suit = #{referralMainSuit},
apply_dept_id = #{applyDeptId},
apply_company_code = #{applyCompanyCode},
apply_company_name = #{applyCompanyName},
hope_in_time = #{hopeInTime},
apply_id = #{applyId},
apply_name = #{applyName},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
is_house = #{isHouse},
house_bed = #{houseBed},
nusre_type_code = #{nusreTypeCode},
disease_id = #{diseaseId},
disease_name = #{diseaseName},
reality_in_time = #{realityInTime},
status_code = #{statusCode},
visit_dept_id = #{visitDeptId},
visit_doctor_id = #{visitDoctorId},
visit_doctor_name = #{visitDoctorName},
visit_time = #{visitTime},
remark = #{remark},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
where id = #{id}
